title: Zac's many problems fan fic
body:
Zac’s diary pg. 5: My many problems

Well to be honest I don’t really know what I am, I mean I know I’m green and well, slimy I might be slime but I don’t know. I was made to be some sort of weapon, ha some weapon I am I wouldn’t hurt a fly. Ok but get this. Being a man made of slime, or whatever I am is fun, as in really fun. Being able to suck in air and blow my self up like a balloon! Then floating down, down, down sometimes off of buildings because since I’m slime I don’t really feel pain. Anyways there was this time when dad, ah that’s the guy that made me, had to lock me away to keep me from beating up the neighbourhood Monster. No, no I’m just kidding it was this kid that kept bullying me. Getting along with the story haha it’s funny actually I just slipped through the cracks of my bedroom door and gave my friend a little visit. So I guess I could hurt a fly but I bet you don’t really care about any of that. I was meant to be scary, you know look intimidating! But I came out like this a green putty monster with a cute little antennae or whatever it is sticking out of my head. So that’s me, oh yea dad called me Zac by the way to add to the scare factor, it’s supposed to mean something I’m pretty sure but nobody really cares to much about that. So yea that’s me on an average day, doing stupid things nothing special. I could preach about some more of my day to day life but I’m just too busy waiting for dad to make me look better.
